features: Counting Animals Toys For Kids:This Preschool Learning Animals Toy includes 36 animals(Lion,Elephant,Sheep,Hippo,Cow,Rhinoceros) in different colors,6 rainbow color sorting bowls,2 tweezers and 1 storage bucket.The Montessori rainbow toys can be used to not only help preschooler and toddler learn the different colors and animals,early math counting activities but also enhance kids’ fine motor skills while playing.Kids will enjoy this lovely animals toddler games.

Help To Improve Fine Motor Skills:There are multiple ways to play the counting animal toys.Children can sort different color animals into the corresponding rainbow bowls by using tweezers or hands.Kids can play this sorting&stacking game alone or turn it into a race playing with friends.Through games,kids need to learn picking up,grasping and releasing,which can enhance fine motor skills needed for writing,color recognition,hand-eye coordination.Perfect learning toys and STEM educational tool!

Great Montessori Educational Math Toys:This counting animals math games can help children master early math skill such as counting,grouping,patterning and comparing.Boys and girls can also use this preschool learning toys as a support tool to learn simple mathematical operations including count,add,subtract and so on.This animals matching game is designed to inspire and stimulate children's thinking.This rainbow sensory toy is suitable for kids,toddlers,preschoolers aged 3, 4, 5 & 6 years old.

High Quality & Safety:The STEM rainbow animals sorting toys are made of high quality rubber material.Durable and washable.Colors are vibrant and easy to identify.Each Animal ranges size from 1.2-1.8in.Perfect for toddlers to grasp.These are great Act-Play toys for Multi-child family or parent-children interaction.The counting animals matching games are also prefect as daycare supplies.The storage bucket provided make the animals learning toys are easy to collect store and carry after playing.

Perfect Preschool Learning Toys For Kids:Nice teaching tool and helpful learning resource for parents, teachers to use in kindergarten daycare classroom or at home.Great Montessori toys for home school activity or as autism learning resource materials.Lovely animals Toys for Boys and Girls aged 3-5 years old.Comes in a nice, transparent bucket,which makes this set super easy to store and put away.Best Christmas Gift / Birthday Gift /Children's Day Gifts any other holiday gift for children.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RAEQKS Counting Animals Toys Matching Games with Sorting Bowls BENEFITS of COUNTING Animal TOYS Promote brain health developmentLearn early math skill such as counting,grouping,patterning and comparing.Practice simple mathematical operations including count,add,subtractExercise hand gripping skills and to coordinate the hand-eye togetherImprove their ability to recognize colors,hand manipulation and physical coordination.

GREAT GIFT IDEA FOR KIDS Product Specification Color: red,yellow,blue,purple,green and orange（the colors of the different animals are random）Material:high quality rubber material. （A little softer than plastic）Quantity: 36 x colorful animals+ 6 x sorting cups+2 x tweezers Multiple Ways To Play Children can not only sort different color animals into the corresponding colors bowls by using tweezers or hands or they can stack bowls in different shape.Through these games,kids need to learn picking up,grasping and releasing,which can enhance Motor-Skills,color recognition,hand-eye coordination. Montessori Educational Math Toys help children master early math skill such as counting,grouping,patterning and comparing.help children learn simple mathematical operations including count,add,subtract and so on.This rainbow sensory toy is suitable for kids,toddlers,preschoolers aged 3, 4, 5 & 6 years old.

Perfect Gift For Boys and Girls High Quality Preschool Learning Toys The size of storage bucket:3.74*6.3 inThe size of animals :1.5-1.77 inThe size of clip:3.74*0.9 inThe size of rainbow color sorting bowl:1.57*3.22 in Perfect size for toddlers to grasp. durable and washable.The storage bucket provided is easy to collect store and carry after playing. Multiple ways to play Perfect Act-Play toys for Multi-child family or parent-children interaction. Multiple Games in one Matching GameSorting & Stacking ToyEarly math toyRainbow color sensory toys Perfect Gift For Boys and Girls Kids can play this sorting&stacking game alone or turn it into a race to see who can pick up the color dinosaurs and sort correctly the fastest with friends.Kids will love this game!Helpful learning resource for parents, teachers to use in kindergarten daycare classroom or at home.Great Montessori toys for home school activity or as autism learning resource materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The colors are really bright which my toddler loves. The animals and bowls are built with sturdy plastic. The lid doesn't fit back on the storage case so I had to put them in another storage bin. The pinchers are a little hard for my toddler so she will have to grow into it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddlers favorite toy!
reviews.reviewText: This toy is perfect for mental activity for the day!You can color sort, learn animals and use hand and eye coordination!My toddler loves playing with this! It's small toy that you feel like you ads picking them up all the time but it's worth it for me since my toddler loves it so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps toddler busy
reviews.reviewText: Love this for helping my little one learn colors. It comes with tongs which are helpful in keeping her engaged in learning while also playing. Material is good quality and sturdy. They even hold up in the bath tub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great learning toy
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 2 year old who has too many toys and he loves it. He sorts, uses the tongs to pick up the animals (great for fine motor development), makes patterns (with assistance), makes all the animal sounds, and identifies color names.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: fIT IS cHRISTMAS STOCKING...HE LOVED IT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Broken tail, but company easy to work with
reviews.reviewText: My son likes the set. Lower rating due to poor quality check. There was a lion missing a tail as you can see in the picture. It is not worth a return for me, but I want other buyers to be aware in case they are purchasing a gift for someone else.Update: The company contacted me after seeing my original 2 star review and was easy to work with. I updated the review to a 4 star since they had great customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kiddos love it
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughters love to play with this game. It is sturdy and high quality. Would recommend it to anyone.
